name: ts-bot-base
description: The base of all Liam's public, modular bots

scripts.sync: git submodule init && git submodule sync --recursive && git submodule update --recursive && git submodule foreach git pull origin master && git submodule foreach git submodule init && git submodule foreach git submodule sync --recursive && git submodule foreach git checkout master
scripts.pullrecurse: git pull && git submodule foreach git pull origin master
scripts.checkoutrecurse: git checkout master && git submodule foreach git checkout master

author: Emissions#2565
